languages.text: "Теперь понятно, почему обходчики на прилежащих участках так часто "гибли в авариях".
"Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
languages.original_text: "Теперь понятно, почему обходчики на прилежащих участках так часто "гибли в авариях".

traits.locale_text: "Now I see why so many lineworkers in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
"Now I see why so many lineworkers in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
"Now I see why so many lineworkers in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
"Now I see why so many lineworkers in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
"Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
"Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

languages.text: « Maintenant, je comprends mieux pourquoi autant d'inspecteurs ont eu des "accidents" dans les compartiments adjacents. »
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant, je comprends mieux pourquoi autant d'inspecteurs ont eu des "accidents" dans les compartiments adjacents. »

languages.text: «Ahora sé por qué tantos inspectores de los compartimentos adyacentes habían sufrido "accidentes"».
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

traits.locale_text: «Ahora sé por qué tantos inspectores de los compartimentos adyacentes habían sufrido "accidentes"».

languages.text: “现在我终于明白，为什么邻近区域那么多检察人员都发生‘事故’了。”
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

traits.locale_text: “现在我终于明白，为什么邻近区域那么多检察人员都发生‘事故’了。”

languages.text: 「隣接エリアにいた多くの検査官が『事故』と呼ばれるものに遭った理由がわかった」
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

traits.locale_text: 「隣接エリアにいた多くの検査官が『事故』と呼ばれるものに遭った理由がわかった」

languages.text: "Ich verstehe nun, warum so viele Inspektoren in den benachbarten Modulen 'Unfälle' hatten."
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe nun, warum so viele Inspektoren in den benachbarten Modulen 'Unfälle' hatten."

languages.text: "Bitişik kompartımanlarda neden bu kadar çok müfettişin 'kaza' geçirdiğini şimdi anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Now I see why so many inspectors in the adjacent compartments have had 'accidents.'"
